Choppiness of turning and moving seems an artifact of emulating the old school games it's a tribute to since it's only a problem with keyboard controls not mouse controls, but in the tutorial using the sniper rifle's zoom in leaves the view raised upwards (I'm assuming from emulating the kickback of the rifle) leaving you unable to proceed in practice if not in reality (maybe there's a key to recenter your view but I haven't found it yet
I never seen game like this, it's literally amazing af!

it's possible to switch to fullscreen mode
*set video mode* -> *fullscreen mode* -> *Yes*
does not work at all
Boring game with bugs
When you love the old Wolfenstein Game you will be happy! Great work from this awesome team.

The game itself is a jewel, a vibrant homage to When Eagles Dare and other WWII movies. An absolute must-play!

Unfortunately, it's on Linux. The game slow down dramatically in a few levels, and one would have to re-install drivers, reconfigure the game, shut down other applications, etc...

So, the game is great, but it's not running properly on this pile of junk called Linux.
summary: Great game, a shame it's on Linux

To always start in full screen mode, edit the following file: ~/snap/boa/common/saves_and_config.boa.conf and change 'fullscreen=false' to 'fullscreen=true'.

its pretty good but like I sad in the s=naem thing it could really use some better presets and also people keep on having problems with like keyboard controls and stuff but thats not actually supported thats just part of the engine (GZDoom) and the GZDoom devs don't seem to want to give modders the abuility to change up the menus and remove controls oh and one last thing its running an old version of gzdoom newer ones have vulkan support and some other cool stuff so you might want to look into switching out the gzdoom it comes with or you could just wait till the next BOA update
summary: Good gamm but could use better presets

description:
This one could have been good if only the controls really worked.
To complete the "Training" you'll need to throw grenades.
The throw grenades function is not assigned by default and attempting to map the function to a button is futile.

Fantastic. Fell in love with it. But had to uninstall because towards the end of the second level the game lagged way too much, even with all the settings turned down. I know this is a limitation of the engine, but when designing a game hardware capabilities should be taken into account, ny Laptop isn't low specced by any means - probably about average so I would consider a game on the doom engine playable. unfortunately not.
summary: Great game, But needs some serious optimisation

description: very good,cus it doesnt lag on my system and it is very reliable and also easy to download. and it is original
THE GAME IS FUN BUT IT LAGS ON MY PC

It's got everything, MoH music, CoD sounds, old feel, all combined with various modern effects we get in modern games, such as modern light glare and modern map style.

I'd only prefer if you guys could work on optimization since this game's utilizing 70% of my GTX 1050 all the time, not to mention my CPU is screaming (however I do get 60fps with no stuttering).

Memory optimization is great, only 700MB of CPU RAM and about as much of GPU's VRAM.

You've done an amazing job with character's model style. I would however prefer to be able to choose to have real 3D models that resamble those plastic models that we'd get in classic MoHAA or CoD 1. Of course, that's a lot of hard work, so it's great as it is as well.
i think its the games that should be a 5 out of 5 the game is just so inspireing to play it just reamind me of the steam games.
summary: i think its the games that should be a 5 out of 5

...for those situations where you cannot proceed in the game without being extremely lucky with the right press of keys in the absolutely correct split second, in order to reach a certain goal before the door locks again, or in order to jump to the next ledge without overshooting your goal. So you find yourself reloading the game again and again for hundreds of times to fail in the same challenge. Maybe this stuff is easier if you have a controller, but for my taste, this is way out of balance. I find those things extremely frustrating, and now, reaching another thing like that in Hades III in the excavation, I finally give up and delete the game from my computer. Pity, because without that frustrating stuff I really enjoyed it. I played Wolfenstein 3D when I was young, and that game put me back into that old mindset.

This is built on the doom engine, meaning its really well done. However contrarily to what people say, this came you need some dedicated hardware and a chunk of ram to run well. This game might be accelerated 3d graphics, but it has enough modifications to make it run with modern looks, but you do need a beefy enough GPU to run it. 

My RX590 can do 60 FPS high on Crysis

It can do 60 FPS Ultra on this with some modifications to a few things.

Un des meilleurs clone de Doom et de Wolfenstein.

Très bonne ambiance et jouabilité qui raviront les nostalgiques.
Visiblement même mon laptop récent et bien équipé ne suffit pas: tout est fluide jusqu'à un moment dans le second niveau où subitement le jeu se met à ralentir à n'en plus devenir jouable.
J'ai essayé de régler les options mais rien n'y a fait.

Le jeu original tournait de manière fluide il y a 15-20 ans sur des machines très peu puissante. La le graphisme est digne du jeu original mais ets très lent sur des machines beaucoup plus puissantes : chercher l'erreur
summary: Assez minable, graphisme d'il y a 20 ans mais très lent

Excellent projet de la communauté : un très bon mix de l'univers Doom et de jeux cultes de l'histoire de la seconde guerre mondiale.
Gameplay très intéressant malgré quelques détails déroutants (pas de headshot, les roulades des ennemis les protègent miraculeusement de tout...).
De même, très bon boulot pour la traduction française.
Techniquement, le jeu fonctionne très bien sous Ubuntu 20.04 avec un processeur i3-8100 et une petite carte graphique type GT1030.

description: Ставлю 5 звезд не из-за исторических событий как тут был коментарий ниже. 5 звезд с точки технической сложности так как я понимаю что написать игру с в таком хорошем качестве еще и на Линукс это реально шедевр и знаю сколько на это надо убить сил и времени. Так что разработчики молодцы что развиваете достойные проекты на Линукс системах.
